title: Datadog Operator
description:
The Datadog Operator is an open source Kubernetes Operator that enables you to deploy and configure the Datadog Agent in a Kubernetes environment.

The Datadog Operator dashboard gives you visibility into health and performance metrics of the Operator and overview of the resources it manages.

Further reading around the Datadog Operator and Kubernetes Controllers
* [Datadog Operator](https://docs.datadoghq.com/containers/datadog_operator/)
* [Kubernetes Metrics Reference](https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/instrumentation/metrics/)
* [Kubernetes Operator Pattern](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/extend-kubernetes/operator/)

definition.content:
### The Datadog Operator is an open source Kubernetes Operator that enables you to deploy and configure the Datadog Agent in a Kubernetes environment.

The Datadog Operator dashboard gives you visibility into health and performance metrics of the Operator and overview of the resources it manages.

***Some of the graphs assume `datadog` as the [DatadogAgent](https://docs.datadoghq.com/containers/kubernetes/installation/?tab=operator#deploy-an-agent-with-the-operator) resource name. They will appear empty if that's not the case.***

Further reading around the Datadog Operator and Kubernetes Controllers
* [Datadog Operator](https://docs.datadoghq.com/containers/datadog_operator/)
* [Kubernetes Metrics Reference](https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/instrumentation/metrics/)
* [Kubernetes Operator Pattern](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/extend-kubernetes/operator/)

definition.title: Work Queue Work Duration Average Seconds
Work Queue Longest Running Processor in seconds
Conroller Runtime Webhook Latency Average Seconds
